/hr/charts.authelia.com-authelia.title: authelia helm release
/hr/charts.authelia.com-authelia.name: authelia
/hr/charts.authelia.com-authelia.doc: Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server and portal fulfilling the identity and access management (IAM) role of information security in providing multi-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion for common reverse proxies.
